summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing the Director to enter into an agreement with Pierce County, and to receive reimbursement for activities undertaken in connection with mobilization of the Fire Department's Urban Search and Rescue Team; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund, all by three fourths vote of the City Council.
